Timeseries

ModernTCN: A Modern Pure Convolution Structure for General Time Series Analysis (ICLR 2024)

DLinear: Are Transformer Effective for Time Series Forecasting? (AAAI 2022)

PatchTST: A Time Series is Worth 64 Words: Long-Term Forecasting With Transformers (ICLR 2023)

FITS: Modeling Time Series with 10k Parameters (ICLR 2023)

iTransformer: Inverted Transformers are Effective for Time Series Forecasting (ICLR 2024)

GAFormer: Enhancing Timeseries Transformers Through Group-Aware Embeddings (ICLR 2024)

SimMTM: A Simple Pre-Training Framework for Masked Time-Series Modeling (NeurIPS 2023)

TS2Vec: Towards Universal Representation of Time Series (AAAI 2022)

SoftCLT: Soft Contrastive Learning for Time Series (ICLR 2024)

(Survey paper) Time Series Forecasting With Deep Learning A Survey (Philos Trans R Soc A. 2020)

(Survey paper) Transformers in Time Series: A Survey (IJCAI 2023)

Crossformer: Transformer Utilizing Cross-Dimension Dependency for Multivariate Time Series Forecasting (ICLR 2023)

(Survey paper) Self-Supervised Learning for Time Series Analysis: Taxonomy, Progress, and Prospects (Arxiv 2023)

Time-LLM: Time Series Forecasting by Reprogramming Large Language Models (ICLR 2024)

Revisiting Long-term Time Series Forecasting: An Investigation on Linear Mapping (Arxiv 2023)

Dish-TS: A General Paradigm for Alleviating Distribution Shift in Time Series Forecasting (AAAI 2023)

Corrformer: Interpretable weather forecasting for worldwide stations with a unified deep model (NMI 2023)

Pathformer: Multi-scale Transformers with Adaptive Pathways for Time Series Forecasting (ICLR 2024)

TimeMixer: Decomposable Multiscale Mixing for Time Series Forecasting (ICLR 2024)
